channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple fined $116 million over app privacy prompts
item.description: Apple has been fined more than €98 million (about $116 million) by Italy's antitrust regulator over the "excessively burdensome" privacy rules it imposes on third-party apps. The Italian Competition Authority (AGCM) says that Apple abused its dominant app store market position by burdening developers with "disproportionate" terms around data collection that exceed privacy law requirements, […]...

item.title: How solopreneurs can break free from a corporate mindset
item.description: The secrets to achieving the autonomy you were after in the first place. You quit the 9-to-5 to have more control over your time. You wanted flexibility, autonomy, and the freedom to structure your days around your life instead of someone else’s schedule.

item.title: Someone’s made a USB-C version of the iPod Classic, complete with clickwheel — and it’s extremely cheap
item.description: This budget MP3 player is an Apple lawsuit waiting to happen

item.title: CES 2026: Everything we're expecting from tech's biggest conference in January
item.description: As we hurtle towards the end of the year, the shadow of CES hovers on the horizon. Tech’s biggest annual conference is starting in just under two weeks, and we already know some of the products and announcements that could be in store. The CES 2026 show floor is officially open from January 6 through 9, but the fun kicks off with events on Sunday January 4 and a host of press conferences on Monday. As always, product demos, announcements and networking will be happening at the Las Vegas Convention Center and other hotels all over the city. As usual, Engadget will be covering the event in-perso...

item.title: Huawei Band 10 : ce bracelet connecté abordable de 2025 chute déjà sous les 30 €
item.description: Grâce à ses cent modes d'entraînement, le Huawei Band 10 pourra vous accompagner lors de toutes vos séances de sport. Vendu à 49,99 euros lors de sa sortie, il passe à 29,99 euros grâce à cette offre chez Amazon

item.title: Battlefield 6 fans are furious after spotting apparent AI 'slop' for sale in the game's store
item.description: Battlefield 6 players are accusing EA of selling alleged AI-generated content in the game's store, despite the VP general manager at DICE previously stating that the game wouldn't feature any generative AI content.

item.title: NordProtect adds fraud monitoring tool to help protect users from scams
item.description: NordProtect has been upgraded from "sufficient" to "outstanding," but new tools remain only available to US customers.

item.title: The Morning After: The best games of 2025
item.description: As many of us hunker down for the holidays, you might want to tackle some of the best games we’ve seen this year: the long-time-coming Silksong, the critically acclaimed (and sumptuous) Expedition 33 and the bizarre world of Baby Steps. Engadget Not to mention the Switch 2, which is slowly building out its own exclusive library with Metroid Prime 4 and Donkey Kong Bananza. Rare for me, this year, I’ve played many of the new games we’ve picked. Brag. I’d recommend both Dispatch and Blue Prince — I still haven’t completed the latter, but, yes, I’ve unlocked the secret elevator. And if you don’t ...

item.title: I reviewed the Oppo Find X9 Pro, and it’s the maximized flagship for Android lovers
item.description: The Oppo Find X9 Pro is a maxed-out pro camera phone that will happily wear its inspirations on its sleeve if it means delivering a fantastic flagship experience.

item.title: How to set up an Apple Watch for a child
item.description: Giving a child an Apple Watch can offer extra peace of mind and tools that promote independence in a controlled way. Apple’s Family Setup feature makes it possible for a kid to use an Apple Watch without owning an iPhone, and the feature set has expanded thanks to recent watchOS updates. It supports communication controls, location tools, Schooltime limits and privacy protections that allow a parent or guardian to manage how the device is used throughout the day. The setup process begins with creating or signing in with a child’s Apple ID. It continues with adding them to your Family Sharing g...

item.title: ‘Five Nights at Freddy’s 2’ Director Emma Tammi Explains How Abby Anchors the Sequel
item.description: Young actor Piper Rubio gets a special focus in the hit horror video game adaptation, which you can now rent or buy on digital platforms.

item.title: Mint Mobile’s MINTernet Powered by T-Mobile at $30/Month Is Now a Budget 5G Home Internet Option
item.description: The folks who brought you unlimited 5G data on the world's largest cellular network are at it again, this time with huge savings on premium, unlimited home internet.

item.title: iBuyPower RDY Slate 9MP R01 Gaming PC Review: Great Value
item.description: iBuyPower’s prebuilt gaming desktop tries some new tricks but comes with a few flaws.

item.title: Votre navigateur IA peut se faire pirater par une simple phrase cachée : voici comment et pourquoi
item.description: OpenAI reconnaît que son navigateur Atlas, et par extension tous les agents IA, garderont un talon d'Achille permanent : les injections de prompt. La firme sort l'artillerie lourde pour se défendre, mais prévient déjà : ne baissez jamais la garde.

item.title: Alerte sur Mac : un virus a trouvé comment contourner la sécurité d’Apple
item.description: Une nouvelle variante du malware MacSync s'est lancée à l'assaut des Mac. En se cachant dans une application Swift signée, le virus est capable de contourner les mécanismes de protection d'Apple. Au terme de l'intrusion, les pirates peuvent voler mots de passe, trousseau iCloud, portefeuilles crypto et fichiers sensibles sur l'ordinateur.

item.title: The iPhone 18 is rumored to be on track for an early 2027 launch, while the iPhone 18 Pro may get minimal design changes
item.description: We've got some more information on what to expect from Apple's next series of flagship smartphones.

item.title: The Science That Will Shape 2026
item.description: Despite everything, science goes on.

item.title: Google’s and OpenAI’s Chatbots Can Strip Women in Photos Down to Bikinis
item.description: Users of AI image generators are offering each other instructions on how to use the tech to alter pictures of women into realistic, revealing deepfakes.

item.title: The best design books of 2025
item.description: From an accessible history of design to a facsimile of a super rare architecture magazine, these are the books we loved this year. It’s easy, for me at least, to be cynical about the state of design. Our visual environment can feel bland, everything from brands to buildings homogenized around similar styles. The ever-impending AI takeover can make the future of this work uncertain. My reading around design this year tended to focus on two things: looking back and looking ahead. ...

item.title: Avis aux sportifs : le dernier casque à conduction osseuse de Shokz est presque à moitié prix
item.description: Pour profiter de votre musique durant vos séances de running en plein air, tout en restant attentif à votre environnement, un casque à conduction osseuse comme le Shokz OpenRun Pro 2 est idéal. Bonne nouvelle, il est en promotion à 109,33 euros au lieu de 199 euros de base. C'est presque moitié prix !

item.title: Alphabet secures $4.75 billion Intersect deal to make sure its data centers have enough energy
item.description: Google to buy out Intersect Power after offering financial backing in 2024, in a bid to help bolster its data center strategy.

item.title: Legendary FPS developer Vince Zampella has passed away
item.description: Vince Zampella, best known as the co-creator of Call of Duty and co-founder of Respawn Entertainment, has died in a car accident in Los Angeles at the age of 55.

item.title: 6-7? Aura farming? 2025s viral internet slang, explained
item.description: Explore 2025's viral internet slang, from aura farming to Fanum tax. Here's what these terms mean, how they’re evolving, and why they’re so popular.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for December 23, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: Phishing emails and fake adverts flood inboxes this Christmas - and they’re getting harder to detect than ever
item.description: Be extra safe with your clicks this Christmas, experts say.

item.title: Google Assistant survit à 2025 : le grand remplacement par Gemini est officiellement reporté
item.description: Google confirme que la transition de Google Assistant vers Gemini, initialement prévue pour cette fin d'année, est repoussée à 2026. Une officialisation qui vient crédibiliser une date butoir aperçue dès le mois dernier : mars 2026.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for December 23, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: The "feature-stuffed" Garmin Vivoactive 6 drops to a record-low price on Amazon
item.description: You can now snap up the excellent Garmin Vivoactive 6 for its lowest-ever price of $249.99 at Amazon.

item.title: Chinese Crypto Scammers on Telegram Are Fueling the Biggest Darknet Markets Ever
item.description: Online black markets once lurked in the shadows of the dark web. Today, they’ve moved onto public platforms like Telegram—and are racking up historic illicit fortunes.

item.title: Big Balls Was Just the Beginning
item.description: DOGE dominated the news this year as Elon Musk’s operatives shook up several US government agencies. It’s far from over.

item.title: How a former Forest Service employee changed the future of housing in California
item.description: Inside the genesis of a YIMBY advocacy organization that just successfully pushed for the passage of revolutionary housing laws that could finally ease California’s housing crisis. One April night eight years ago, two tech leaders sat down with a former Forest Service employee at Terroir, a natural wine bar in San Francisco. Then they started sketching out a plan that would eventually reshape California’s housing policy....

item.title: This AI slop-free browser is the best idea of 2025
item.description: Teleport back in time to Nov. 30, 2022. A new extension for Chrome stops AI slop from invading your life. Called Slop Evader, it is a temporal firewall that modifies your Google search queries to exclude any results indexed after November 30, 2022. That is the day the ChatGPT asteroid hit the open web, upending culture and reality as we know it.

item.title: Homebuilder Lennar’s average home price is down 21% from the pandemic housing market boom peak
item.description: The key question is how much of that 21.4% decline reflects mix shift, outright price cuts, or larger incentive packages? Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Voici le meilleur casque audio de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Le meilleur casque Bluetooth testé par Frandroid est le Bose QuietComfort Ultra Heaphone (2e génération). Découvrez pourquoi ce produit a reçu le Frandroid Awards avec Delos de sa catégorie.

item.title: 23 ans plus tard, GTA Vice City est maintenant jouable… directement sur Google Chrome
item.description: Une équipe de développeurs a réussi un petit exploit qui en dit long sur la faible puissance des consoles de notre enfance : faire tenir GTA Vice City sur un simple navigateur internet. On vous explique.

item.title: Samsung fait machine arrière : ces deux fonctions photo sont de retour sur vos Galaxy, mais avec un piège !
item.description: Les modes « Prise unique » et « Enregistrement double » font leur grand retour dans la seconde version bêta de One UI 8.5, mais Samsung a décidé de modifier en profondeur leur accessibilité.

item.title: Vibe code a gift this Christmas: my helpful guide for last-minute crafting
item.description: Still looking for a Christmas gift? Try vibe coding a present with my guide.
